text:
The first time each turn you install a virus program, place 2 virus counters on The Nihilist.
When your turn begins, you may remove 2 virus counters from your installed cards. If you do, draw 2 cards unless the Corp trashes the top card of R&D.
title: The Nihilist

text:
When the turn on which you installed The Class Act ends, draw 4 cards.
The first time you draw a card each turn, draw 1 additional card. Add 1 of the drawn cards to the bottom of your stack.
title: The Class Act

text:
Use each ability on The Artist only once per turn.
[click]: Gain 2[credit].
[click]: Install a program or piece of hardware, lowering its cost by 1.
title: The Artist
